SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controllers

Class SimpleAtraction

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.controllers.SimpleAtraction
public class SimpleAtraction extends Object
Manages the simple attraction simulation.

Handles the setup, saving, loading, and drawing of the simulation state. Interacts with WindowFrame, Engine, SimulationState, and N2mAtraction.

      Saves the current simulationState using SimulationSaverGSON.

    • loadSimState

      public void loadSimState()
      Loads the simulation state using SimulationSaverGSON and updates the engine.

    • selectMover

      public Mover selectMover(javafx.geometry.Point2D point)
      Selects a mover based on the given point.
      Parameters:
      point - the Point2D to check for a mover.
      Returns:
      the selected Mover, or null if no mover is found.

    • draw

      public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Draws the current simulationState on the given GraphicsContext.

      Clears the canvas, sets the background color, and translates and scales the canvas. Iterates through all movers and updates their positions using MoveableHandl. If the sun is present, it is also drawn.

      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to draw on.

    • redraw

      public void redraw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Redraws the current simulationState on the given GraphicsContext.

      Similar to draw(GraphicsContext), but does not update the positions of movers. Clears the canvas, sets the background color, and translates and scales the canvas. Iterates through all movers and draws them using MoveableHandl. If the sun is present, it is also drawn.

      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext to redraw on.

    • getSimulationState

      public SimulationState getSimulationState()

    • setSimulationState

      public void setSimulationState(SimulationState simulationState)
